topics.body:
just a bit of rumor mill, but:
Steam machines may be unofficially dead/dying.

The problem with it is what we all saw coming; why buy a steam machine when you already have a computer?

In the long run steamos probably will still be successful.



Nintendo may announce it's new device soon.  It probably will be a handheld-console hybrid.  If you're expecting a wiiu2; it probably won't be but rather a wiiu2/3ds2 hybrid.


New xbox one with 1tb hard drive.


PC gaming has regained the title king of devices and their popularity is exploding.

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557408ee6368721d51001551#post_557408ee6368721d51001551
Microsoft is apparently trying to pressure gaming companies to put their games on pc.  They haven't ruled out pushing even Halo or such to pc.


There's been a long standing rumor that microsoft is killing off the xbox line by pushing everything to pc and considering that they're pushing companies to ad pc ports it's not so crazy after all.



My guess for what the next generation of gaming is going to be:
3ds2 vs ps5 vs pc
